Wisdome's judgment of folly. Delivered in a sermon at the spital, in the solemn assembly of the city, on Munday in Easter-week, April XI. A.D. MDCLIII. By Thomas Horton D.D. Horton, Thomas, d. 1673.
[4], 31, 40-71, [1] p.
Printed by T. Maxey for Samuel Gellibrand, at the Ball in S. Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1653.
Text continuous despite pagination. Running title reads: A sermon preached at the spital. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
